Still one of the greatest games ever made with some of the best pacing seen in a first person shooter. Each hour is something new that never takes away from the whole that is this game's journey. It shooting while dated still has a punch that is made worthwhile through it's superb level design. It's themes still hold weight with villains that still get my teeth grinding especially from Breen a boot licking bastard who allies with horrid entities not only for their scientific magnitude but more over for the pride and power it gives him to be above people he finds lesser, almost like a terrible boss given monumental power which he kinda is. This conflict through seen in many other games of rebellion against higher powers still grips me from the size of it from the alien race who takes hold of the human race to the ominous G-man using you to fit any task he needs at any time and it's willingness to not give you a conclusion completely satisfactory against these entities for a game of toppling them down still hurt in a way I don't feel with much else.

One word. ~CLASSIC~
Actually one of the first few games i purchased on steam and totally worth it.
For almost being 2020, the game's visuals are a bit outdated, but the game's beauty still stands strong. HL2 is very re-playable, has amazing characters that draw you into the story, decent factors of progression, cutscenes are great, along with the physics involved. If you consider yourself a gamer and haven't played this game then somethings wrong lol :)
~10/10~
